name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack

reviews.name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack
reviews.reviewText: I bought additional step raisers for my old step. The order came very quickly nicely packed, the pick up was fast and pleasant, no complaints. And the raisers fit perfectly. Nothing to say but thank you!
reviews.title: The size and the shape fit perfectly.

reviews.name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack
reviews.reviewText: I added these risers to my Step system which I have had for a few years. They helped me to get to the next level. They fit perfectly.
reviews.title: Just what I expected!

reviews.name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack
reviews.reviewText: This was exactly what I needed, so I got exactly what I ordered. The risers came in a regular box via UPS. The package was in good condition when I got it and I am happy with it.
reviews.title: Got what I was looking for

reviews.name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack
reviews.reviewText:
I needed extra risers for my stepper, & these fit in perfectly.
This was a good buy, pretty good value for the money. By buying the risers separately, I didn't have to buy a new stepper, I could just add to what I already had.
reviews.title: This was a good buy!

reviews.name: The Step Circuit Step Violet Risers, 2-Pack
reviews.reviewText: Fits perfectly in elevating previously purchased circut step, more intense workout, great investment
reviews.title: Excellent product
